verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> He was telling <S%G3004><s%> them a parable <S%G3850><s%> to show that at all <S%G3842><s%> times <S%G3842><s%> they ought <S%G1163><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> and not to lose <S%G7051><s%> heart, <S%G7051><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "There was in a certain <S%G5100><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> a judge <S%G2923><s%> who did not fear <S%G5399><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and did not respect <S%G1788><s%> man. <S%G444><s%>

"And there was a widow <S%G5503><s%> in that city, <S%G4172><s%> and she kept coming <S%G2064><s%> to him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'Give <S%G1556><s%> me legal <S%G1556><s%> protection <S%G1556><s%> from my opponent. <S%G476><s%>'

"And for a while <S%G5550><s%> he was unwilling <S%G3756><s%>; <S%G2309><s%> but afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3778><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> 'Even <S%G2532><s%> though <S%G1487><s%> I do not fear <S%G5399><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> respect <S%G1788><s%> man, <S%G444><s%>

yet <S%G1065><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> widow <S%G5503><s%> bothers <S%G3930><s%> <S%G2873><s%> me, I will give <S%G1556><s%> her legal <S%G1556><s%> protection, <S%G1556><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> by continually <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5056><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> she wear <S%G5299><s%> me out.' "
And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the unrighteous <S%G93><s%> judge <S%G2923><s%> said; <S%G3004><s%>

now <S%G1161><s%> shall not God <S%G2316><s%> bring <S%G4160><s%> about <S%G4160><s%> justice <S%G1557><s%> for His elect, <S%G1588><s%> who cry <S%G994><s%> to Him day <S%G2250><s%> and night, <S%G3571><s%> and will He delay <S%G3114><s%> long <S%G3114><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them?

"I tell <S%G3004><s%> you that He will bring <S%G4160><s%> about <S%G4160><s%> justice <S%G1557><s%> for them speedily. <S%G5034><s%> However, <S%G4133><s%> when the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> will He find <S%G2147><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> on the earth <S%G1093><s%>?"

And He also <S%G2532><s%> told <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> to certain <S%G5100><s%> ones <S%G5100><s%> who trusted <S%G3982><s%> in themselves <S%G1438><s%> that they were righteous, <S%G1342><s%> and viewed <S%G1848><s%> others <S%G3062><s%> with contempt: <S%G1848><s%>
"Two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G444><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up into the temple <S%G2413><s%> to pray, <S%G4336><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> a Pharisee, <S%G5330><s%> and the other <S%G2087><s%> a tax-gatherer.

"The Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and was praying <S%G4336><s%> thus <S%G3778><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> 'God, <S%G2316><s%> I thank <S%G2168><s%> Thee that I am <S%G1510><s%> not like <S%G5618><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> people: <S%G3062><s%> swindlers, <S%G727><s%> unjust, <S%G94><s%> adulterers, <S%G3432><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> tax-gatherer.
'I fast <S%G3522><s%> twice <S%G1364><s%> a week; <S%G4521><s%> I pay <S%G7503><s%> tithes <S%G7503><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that I get. <S%G2932><s%>'

"But the tax-gatherer, standing <S%G2476><s%> some <S%G3113><s%> distance <S%G3113><s%> away, <S%G3113><s%> was even <S%G3761><s%> unwilling <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2309><s%> to lift <S%G1869><s%> up his eyes <S%G3788><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but was beating <S%G5180><s%> his breast, <S%G4738><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'God, <S%G2316><s%> be merciful <S%G2433><s%> to me, the sinner! <S%G268><s%>'

"I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to his house <S%G3624><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> rather <S%G3844><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> the other; <S%G1565><s%> for everyone <S%G3956><s%> who exalts <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be humbled, <S%G5013><s%> but he who humbles <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>"

And they were bringing <S%G4374><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> their babies <S%G1025><s%> to Him so <S%G2443><s%> that He might touch <S%G681><s%> them, but when the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> it, they [began] rebuking <S%G2008><s%> them.

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> for them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Permit <S%G863><s%> the children <S%G3813><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to Me, and do not hinder <S%G2967><s%> them, for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> belongs <S%G1510><s%> to such <S%G5108><s%> as these. <S%G5108><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> does not receive <S%G1209><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a child <S%G3813><s%> shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> it [at all.]"

And a certain <S%G5100><s%> ruler <S%G758><s%> questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Good <S%G18><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> to inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you call <S%G3004><s%> Me good <S%G18><s%>? No <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> is good <S%G18><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> alone. <S%G1520><s%>

"You know <S%G3609><s%> the commandments, <S%G1785><s%> 'Do not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> Do not murder, <S%G5407><s%> Do not steal, <S%G2813><s%> Do not bear <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> witness, <S%G5576><s%> Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and mother. <S%G3384><s%>'"
And he said, <S%G3004><s%> "All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I have kept <S%G5442><s%> from [my] youth. <S%G3503><s%>"

And when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> [this,] He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "One <S%G1520><s%> thing <S%G1520><s%> you still <S%G2089><s%> lack; <S%G3007><s%> sell <S%G4453><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that you possess, <S%G2192><s%> and distribute <S%G1239><s%> it to the poor, <S%G4434><s%> and you shall have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in heaven; <S%G3772><s%> and come, <S%G1204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> Me."
But when he had heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> he became <S%G1096><s%> very <S%G4036><s%> sad; <S%G4036><s%> for he was extremely <S%G4970><s%> rich. <S%G4145><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> looked <S%G3708><s%> at him and said, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> hard <S%G1423><s%> it is for those <S%G3588><s%> who are wealthy <S%G5536><s%> to enter <S%G1531><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>

"For it is easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1525><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the eye <S%G5144><s%> of a needle, <S%G7027><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"
And they who heard <S%G191><s%> it said, <S%G3004><s%> "Then <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> be saved <S%G4982><s%>?"
But He said, <S%G3004><s%> "The things <S%G102><s%> impossible <S%G102><s%> with men <S%G444><s%> are possible <S%G1415><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>"
And Peter <S%G4074><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we have left <S%G863><s%> our own <S%G2398><s%> [homes,] and followed <S%G190><s%> You."

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, there is no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has left <S%G863><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> for the sake <S%G1752><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> shall not receive <S%G2983><s%> many <S%G4179><s%> times <S%G4179><s%> as much <S%G4179><s%> at this <S%G3778><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> and in the age <S%G165><s%> to come, <S%G2064><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%> "

And He took <S%G3880><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> aside <S%G3880><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we are going <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> which are written <S%G1125><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> about the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will be accomplished. <S%G5055><s%>
"For He will be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%> and will be mocked <S%G1702><s%> and mistreated <S%G5195><s%> and spit <S%G1716><s%> upon,
and after they have scourged <S%G3146><s%> Him, they will kill <S%G615><s%> Him; and the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> He will rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%> "

And they understood <S%G4920><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> and this <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G4487><s%> was hidden <S%G2928><s%> from them, and they did not comprehend <S%G1097><s%> the things that were said. <S%G3004><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that as He was approaching <S%G1448><s%> Jericho, <S%G2410><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> man <S%G5185><s%> was sitting <S%G2521><s%> by the road, <S%G3598><s%> begging. <S%G1871><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> a multitude <S%G3793><s%> going <S%G1279><s%> by, he [began] to inquire <S%G4441><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> might be.
And they told <S%G518><s%> him that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%> was passing <S%G3928><s%> by.
And he called <S%G994><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me!"

And those <S%G3588><s%> who led <S%G4254><s%> the way <S%G4254><s%> were sternly <S%G2008><s%> telling <S%G2008><s%> him to be quiet; <S%G4601><s%> but he kept crying <S%G2905><s%> out all <S%G4183><s%> the more, <S%G3123><s%> "Son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me!"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stopped <S%G2476><s%> and commanded <S%G2753><s%> that he be brought <S%G71><s%> to Him; and when he had come <S%G1448><s%> near, <S%G1448><s%> He questioned <S%G1905><s%> him,
"What <S%G5101><s%> do you want <S%G2309><s%> Me to do <S%G4160><s%> for you?" And he said, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> [I want] to regain <S%G308><s%> my sight! <S%G308><s%>"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Receive <S%G308><s%> your sight; <S%G308><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you well. <S%G4982><s%>"

And immediately <S%G3916><s%> he regained <S%G308><s%> his sight, <S%G308><s%> and [began] following <S%G190><s%> Him, glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> and when all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> it, they gave <S%G1325><s%> praise <S%G136><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>
